seo.title: Bitcoin with a 10% discount! Cheaper than anywhere
seo.description: We have reinvented BTC purchase in a unique and profitable way! When you buy BTC with a discount, it's locked in your wallet for 12 months. You can withdraw it anytime you want, without any commissions, but for the original price without the discount. Once the lockup period is finished, you can withdraw the entire amount.
